mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PLOGGING_REVIEW (ID, USER_ID, PLOGGING_ID, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_REGISTER_DATE, REVIEW_UPDATED_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_PLOGGING_REVIEW.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{ploggingId} , #{reviewTitle} , #{reviewContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT TRE.ID, TRE.USER_ID, TRE.PLOGGING_ID, TRE.REVIEW_TITLE, TRE.REVIEW_CONTENT, TRE.REVIEW_REGISTER_DATE, TRE.REVIEW_UPDATED_DATE, TU.USER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_PLOGGING_REVIEW TRE, TBL_USER TU, TBL_PLOGGING TP WHERE TRE.USER_ID = TU.ID AND TRE.PLOGGING_ID = TP.ID
SELECT ID, USER_ID, PLOGGING_ID, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_REGISTER_DATE, REVIEW_UPDATED_DATE FROM TBL_PLOGGING_REVIEW WHERE ID = #{id}
